A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite some truly exciting and wonderful moments\, the Last Jedi seems to want to forge it's own path in an almost arrogant manner. Characters set up in the Force Awakens are either ignored completely or sent sideways in unsatisfying ways\, all for the purpose of forcing a story that should have taken it's time and eased more gracefully into episode XI. Overall TLJ is a fun\, yet frustrating addition to this trilogy. Hopefully JJ Abrams can bring the story full circle and answer the remaining questions with greater satisfaction.
